question: Question: This disciple of the poet Carducci calls classical music "politically suspect" and meets his foe while vacationing in Davos. For 10 points each: [10] Name this Italian humanist who is commissioned to write The Sociology of Suffering for the League for the Organization of Progress and is challenged to a duel by his intellectual rival Leo Naphta.
